text:
Alright, take care. I'm sorry about the sudden
meeting tomorrow, but I'm counting on you.
Well, I'd appreciate it if everyone could hear it together.

...My only concern,
is if we'd come to any harm.

Oh... Well, it's not harmful.
It's actually something good.

It'd do wonders for everyone! I wish for you all to see
it as a result of the hard work you put into your lessons!

... Then I'll make a judgment after hearing the details.
Good job today.

────……
"Got your first job" is written all over your face.
